Html:
Hello, I am using OnMarkerClick to show a context menu. Now I want to add a different context menu when the user clicks in a free place. But the use of MouseClick has precedence over OnMarkerClick and it always shows the second context menu. I figure out that I can use only MouseClick and keep track of current marker with OnMarkerEnter and OnMarkerLeave. Is there anything better?
Thanks

Hello ffried,I want to know how to use the context menu.Could you send me a tutorial?
Thanks
